sqlMap.select: SELECT A.USR_ID, A.USR_OPT_MST_CD, B.MST_CD_NM, B.MST_CD_DESC, A.USR_OPT_CD, C.SUB_CD_NM, A.REG_DTM, A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP, A.MODIFY_DTM, A.MODIFY_USR_ID, A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM STM3001 A INNER JOIN STM4000 B ON ( B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.USR_OPT_MST_CD = B.MST_CD AND B.USE_YN = 'Y') INNER JOIN STM4001 C ON ( B.LIC_GRP_ID = C.LIC_GRP_ID AND C.MST_CD = A.USR_OPT_MST_CD AND C.SUB_CD = A.USR_OPT_CD ) WHERE 1=1 AND USR_ID = #usrId#

SELECT A.USR_ID, A.USR_OPT_MST_CD, B.MST_CD_NM, B.MST_CD_DESC, A.USR_OPT_CD, C.SUB_CD_NM, A.REG_DTM, A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP, A.MODIFY_DTM, A.MODIFY_USR_ID, A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM STM3001 A INNER JOIN STM4000 B ON ( B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.USR_OPT_MST_CD = B.MST_CD AND B.USE_YN = 'Y') INNER JOIN STM4001 C ON ( B.LIC_GRP_ID = C.LIC_GRP_ID AND C.MST_CD = A.USR_OPT_MST_CD AND C.SUB_CD = A.USR_OPT_CD ) WHERE 1=1 AND USR_ID = #usrId# AND USR_OPT_MST_CD = #usrOptMstCd#
SELECT count(*) FROM STM3001 A WHERE 1=1 AND USR_ID = #usrId# AND USR_OPT_MST_CD = #usrOptMstCd#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO STM3001( USR_ID, USR_OPT_MST_CD, USR_OPT_CD, REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP, MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP )VALUES( #usrId#, #usrOptMstCd#, #usrOptCd#, SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp#, SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE STM3001 A SET USR_OPT_CD = #usrOptCd#, MODIFY_DTM = sysdate, MODIFY_USR_ID = #regUsrId#, MODIFY_USR_IP = #regUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND USR_ID = #usrId# AND USR_OPT_MST_CD = #usrOptMstCd#
